name: Divinebeats.GitHub.io
body:
# Hey Welcome to DivineBeats official Page
![](http://i.imgur.com/2bzB2ek.jpg?2)

## TheRoyalSeeker Presents DivineBeats with Sony Walkman|Am3D Zirene Audio Fx|ViPER_V2.4.0.1|Dolby Atmos FOR ALL PHONES
Working exclusively on android lollipop and marshmallow based roms ....

# How to install:
ake nandroid backup [Recommended]
Download the DivineBeatsByTheRoyalSeeker_V4.0.zip [Download Link in 2nd Post]
Transfer it to phone.
Flash it via recovery
Wipe cache and dalvik cache
Reboot your phone and enjoy.

# Features:
Viper4android
Awesome Sound
Working on LP and MM
Sony Walkman
Pon-3 Audio
eXpress Engine
SFORCE SURROUND 3D
48,000 KHz Sampling Rate
Faster Audio Processing
Dolby Digital Plus Libs
Dolby Atmos
Beats Audio Libs
Sony ClearAudio and XLoud libs
SRS Processing
DTS Processing
Noozxoide EIZO-rewireâ„¢ PRO
Louder output in headphones and speaker
Bass enchancement
MegaBass
Divine Equalizer
Am3D Zirene Audio Fx
Sound you have never heard before from your device and many more....

![](http://causefoundation.org/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2013/11/donate-button3.png)
Guys if you want to help me or the mod really made a difference you can help me by donation...
The real problem is that I am not 18 years old till yet and therefore I do not have credit card or bank account but if you want to donate you can send me a gift card via Amazon and it will be highly appreciated and will encourage me to develop more.

Recipient E-mail address: theroyalseekerxda@gmail.com 

Donating Really makes a difference... Even small contributions are appreciated

# Disclaimer:
I will not be responsible if you screw up with your device.


![](http://i.imgur.com/SFOdeai.png?1)

[Latest DivineBeats_v4.0:](http://goo.gl/Qkjk8w)

# DivineBeats Remover:
[Use This](https://goo.gl/WySE2E)

# Don't want Dolby Atmos or Dolby Atmos not working for you?
[Flash This](https://goo.gl/R8WWpR)

# Sony Music aka Walkman Not working correctly?
[Flash This](https://goo.gl/AXPTBb)

# How to Update?
To update DivineBeats follow the steps:
1. Flash the DivineBeats Remover to remove previous version of DivineBeats.
2. In Recovery [eg. TWRP] clear system only.
3. Dirty Flash your current ROM. [If you don't know what is this GOOGLE IT.]
4. Flash the newest version of DivineBeats.
5. Clear Cache and Dalvik Cache.


Q.1: Why I have to follow so many steps?
Ans: It is just to ensure that you get fully functional DivineBeats after update.

Q.2: How to remove DivineBeats completely?
Ans: Just follow the first three steps above mentioned.

# Changelog:
DivineBeats_4.0:
1. Added Am3D Zirene Audio Fx [Thanks to @arcatarc for giving permission]
2. Added Divine Equalizer. [Thanks to @arcatarc for giving permission]
3. Updated Sony Music aka Walkman to latest v9.1.5.A.1.0beta.
4. Added Material white ViPER4Android. [Thanks to @Viper4713]
5. Updated Script.
6. Updated Some Libs.
7. Updated audio_config. 
8. Removed Sound Alive [As many users were complaining about it.]

DivineBeats_3.1.1:
1. Fixed error for no viper4android installation.
2.Added SoundAlive.

DivineBeats_3.1:

1. Updated Sony Music to latest v9.1.4.A.2.1beta [Thanks to @yyz71 for pointing out].
2. Modified script a little bit.

DivineBeats_3.0:

1. Updated Viper4android to latest version 2.4.0.1.
2. Added Dolby Atmos for enhancing user experience and sound.
3.Updated many libs to newest versions.

DivineBeats_2.1:

1. Updated Sony walkman aka music to latest version.
2. Viper4android updated with black material design.
3. Did some coding changes to enhance sound.

DivineBeats_2.0:

1. Updated some libs.
2. Did some coding and script changes.

[Offifcial XDA Thread](http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/software/app-divinebeats-sound-master-phone-sony-t3274355)
